abstract: The confidential finding was in response to a longstanding complaint by the European Union over United States support of Boeing.
snippet: The confidential finding was in response to a longstanding complaint by the European Union over United States support of Boeing.
lead_paragraph: PARIS  A panel at the World Trade Organization ruled on Monday that Boeing had received up to $5 billion in improper subsidies for its 787 Dreamliner and other jets, giving it an unfair advantage against its European rival, Airbus, European officials said.

headline.main: W.T.O. Is Said to Affirm That Boeing Got Improper Subsidies
headline.print_headline: Trade Organization Ruling Is Said to Affirm That Boeing Received Improper Subsidies

byline.original: By Nicola Clark and Christopher Drew
